text: @realDonaldTrump We don’t need polls, we just look at your tweets, your speeches, your behavior and your action on sensitive topics like coronavirus, economy, George Floyd. You have been show insensitivity racism and only support rich and Wall Street and not Main Street. Resign now!!!
